name: The Little Musician
description:
Deep in space, in a forest divided between the Rock Lovers and the Classical Nerds... lives a Little Musician who has lost his creative spark. Play as this Little Musician as he attempts to invite people to his concert in RPG battles!

Made in 72 hours for 2021 Global Game Jam! 

-- 

Team

Programming - Heiden

Art - KCKaiser

Music - Craigory Ham (craigoryham.com)
